results.title: Metformin Alleviates Epirubicin-Induced Endothelial Impairment by Restoring Mitochondrial Homeostasis
results.text_hl: In addition, inhibited expression of @GENE_TFAM @GENE_7019 @@@Mitochondrial transcription factor A@@@ (@GENE_TFAM @GENE_397279 @@@TFAM@@@) and increased @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Deprivation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012892 @@@mitochondria fragmentation@@@ were observed in @CHEMICAL_Epirubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015251 @@@epirubicin@@@-treated cells, which were partially resumed by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ pretreatment.

citations.NLM: Sun Q, Jia H, Cheng S, Wang Y, Wang J. Metformin Alleviates Epirubicin-Induced Endothelial Impairment by Restoring Mitochondrial Homeostasis Int J Mol Sci. 2022 Dec 25;24(1):. PMID: 36613786

results.title: Metformin alleviates lead-induced mitochondrial fragmentation via AMPK/Nrf2 activation in SH-SY5Y cells
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ inhibited PbAc-induced oxidative stress, which mediated @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Deprivation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012892 @@@mitochondrial fragmentation@@@.

results.title: Metformin Resistance Is Associated with Expression of Inflammatory and Invasive Genes in A549 Lung Cancer Cells
results.text_hl: Furthermore, we found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ resistance leads to increased cell migration and G1-phase cell cycle arrest but impairs @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Deprivation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012892 @@@mitochondrial fragmentation@@@.

results.title: Liraglutide Counteracts Endoplasmic Reticulum Stress in Palmitate-Treated Hypothalamic Neurons without Restoring Mitochondrial Homeostasis
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, but not liraglutide, reverted @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Deprivation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012892 @@@mitochondrial fragmentation@@@, and both liraglutide and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ did not protect against either loss of @GENE_COX4I1 @GENE_12857 @@@CoxIV@@@ abundance or MMP.

results.title: Metformin inhibits mitochondrial dysfunction and apoptosis in cardiomyocytes induced by high glucose via upregulating AMPK activity.
results.text_hl: Our study demonstrates that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protects cardiomyocytes from high @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Deprivation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012892 @@@mitochondrial fragmentation@@@ and @DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@apoptosis@@@ by activating @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@.

citations.NLM: Wu Y. Metformin inhibits mitochondrial dysfunction and apoptosis in cardiomyocytes induced by high glucose via upregulating AMPK activity. Exp Biol Med (Maywood). 2023 Sep 26;():15353702231191178. PMID: 37750221

results.title: Metformin induces mitochondrial fission and reduces energy metabolism by targeting respiratory chain complex I in hepatic stellate cells to reverse liver fibrosis.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can induce @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Deprivation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012892 @@@mitochondrial fragmentation@@@ and low-level energy metabolism in HSCs, thereby suppressing HSCs activation and proliferation to reverse @DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver fibrosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Su Y, Hou C, Wang M, Ren K, Zhou D, Liu X, Zhao S, Liu X. Metformin induces mitochondrial fission and reduces energy metabolism by targeting respiratory chain complex I in hepatic stellate cells to reverse liver fibrosis. Int J Biochem Cell Biol. 2023 Apr;157():106375. PMID: 36716817

results.title: Metformin Suppresses Diabetes-Accelerated Atherosclerosis via the Inhibition of Drp1-Mediated Mitochondrial Fission
results.text_hl: Overall, these data suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ prevents @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Deprivation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012892 @@@mitochondrial fragmentation@@@ via the @GENE_PRKAA1 @GENE_5562 @@@AMPK@@@-dependent downregulation of @GENE_DNM1L @GENE_74006 @@@Drp1@@@ protein expression.

results.title: Metformin restores the mitochondrial membrane potentials in association with a reduction in TIMM23 and NDUFS3 in MPP+-induced neurotoxicity in SH-SY5Y cells
results.text_hl: As such, the results demonstrated that 1) @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ increased the viability of the MPP+-treated @CELLLINE_CVCL:0019 @@@SH-SY5Y@@@ cells; 2) @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ increased the expression of @GENE_TIMM23 @GENE_100287932 @@@TIMM23@@@ and @GENE_NDUFS3 @GENE_4722 @@@NDUFS3@@@ in @CELLLINE_CVCL:0019 @@@SH-SY5Y@@@ cells, although the expression of these proteins was reduced upon treatment MPP+; and 3) @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protected against MPP+-induced @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Deprivation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012892 @@@mitochondrial fragmentation@@@ and changes in the DeltaPsim.

citations.NLM: Chanthammachat P, Dharmasaroja P. Metformin restores the mitochondrial membrane potentials in association with a reduction in TIMM23 and NDUFS3 in MPP+-induced neurotoxicity in SH-SY5Y cells EXCLI J. 2019;18():812-823. PMID: 31645842
